title: Music For The Post Apocalypse - Wasteland Survivor Themes
description: Survival Music Featuring Soaring Emotional Themes, Tense Underscores And Epic Action Cues
longDescription:
Introducing Wasteland Survivor Themes - a collection of tense underscores, soaring emotional themes, and epic action cues covering all aspects of post apocalyptic life.


This pack contains 17 original themes available as loops and with endings, with additional short loop and alt mix options. Also included are 14 bonus ambient music tracks.Â 


Featuring more than an hour of unique audio, this collection is perfectly suited to any survival game.


Check out our video preview here:

https://youtu.be/WOLaTigHo8s

technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 17 unique themes (loopable and with endings)
  • Additional short loops and alt mixes
  • 14 bonus ambiences (loopable)
  • Stereo files

Number of Audio Wavs: 72

Number of Audio Cues: 72

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 116

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
